instructions.instruction: Halve squash lengthwise and scoop out the seeds
In a large microwave-safe bowl, drizzle squash cut-side up with 1 tablesppon of olive oil and 1 tablespoon of water.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap and microwave until tender for about 20 minutes
Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oik in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the bell pepper, onion, and a teaspoon of salt and cook until softened - so about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic and cook until the vegetables brown - so about 4 more minutes.
Toss in the squash and parsely and season with salt and pepper.
Serve with the sausages and sprinkle with parmesan
melt sugar until liquefied, in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat, until golden in color
pour hot syrup into a 9 inch round glass baking dish, turning the dish to even coat. Be careful, it's hot
in a large bowl, beat in the following: eggs, condensed milk, evaporated milk and vanilla until smooth
pour egg mixture into baking dish, cover with aluminum
bake in preheated oven for 60 minutes. You did remember to preheat it, right?
when baking is complete, invert on serving plate when the flan is completely cool
